text: Aww yeah, Harry Potter fan!
I'm back with another special lesson for you!

Today, we'll see Harry and his classmates 
in Herbology class in their second year at Hogwarts.

Herbology is a real science
that studies herbs and medicinal plants.

In the Wizarding World, it studies
magical plants, as we'll see in today's scene.

This will be a great opportunity
for you to learn some specific vocabulary
in English about plants and gardening.

As you probably already know, this is
one of the great things about learning English
with different movies and series.

They give you all sorts of
real-life situations that can be useful
in gaining English fluency.

Let's dive in!
